nodes.label: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Healthy plant with vibrant green leaves in dark, moist soil, and visible sunlight
Wilted plant with brown leaves in dry, cracked soil, and no sunlight
Plant in light with robust growth vs. plant in darkness with stunted growth
Sequence of plant growth stages illustrating need for water and light
Understands healthy plants need water and light to thrive.
Understands lack of water and light leads to unhealthy plants.
Recognizes the impact of light on plant growth and health.
Demonstrates growth patterns needing water and light.
